ad_text: Eagles One Logistics Group, Inc. Sponsored Are you looking for a team-oriented company where you are valued and your voice matters? If so, look no further. Eagles One is looking for experienced Class A CDL Drivers to join our team. You must be able to drive REGIONAL/OTR. We have manual trucks and all trucks are equipped with E-Logs. We offer WEEKLY PAY, GOOD EQUIPMENT, A WORK-LIFE BALANCE, and a $3000.00 SIGN-ON BONUS. Pay starting at $0.60cpm. Responsibilities: - Safely operate a heavy or tractor-trailer truck - Properly track and document activity log - Report any issues or incidents to dispatch - Pre-trip and Post-trip truck and trailer Qualifications: - Class A Commercial Driver's License - A Minimum of 2 Years of Experience - Current DOT Medical Card - Good MVR
